research_municipality_step.notes: The City of La Villa, TX operates under a Type A General Law with a Council-Manager form of government. For the purpose of this JSON, 'mayor_council' was selected as the closest government type from the provided options, as it features a Mayor and Aldermen (Council Members). There was a slight discrepancy between sources regarding the Mayor Pro Tem and specific Alderman place numbers, with the Texas Municipal League directory providing more detailed 'Place' information.
